reviewertitle: The great settings are really can get a great full wide massage
reviewercontent: Absolutely love this massager shiatsu with heat. Purchased for a friend for Mother's day and it's still in full working order. I had to try it out before I wrapped it up and gave it away then I was so tempted just to order one for myself. The settings are great, including the heat setting and you really get a great full wide massage from this and it works equally well on smaller and taller individuals. It's a very sturdy well made product that used correctly should last several years I'd imagine. The delivery was lightening fast with Prime and extremely well packaged. My friend was thoroughly delighted and their mum also loves using it. May have to treat myself!

reviewertitle: Very impressed with this back massager and would recommend!
reviewercontent: Excellent back massager with firm massaging mechanism, you can really feel the massage and can get it even harder by removing the back cover sheet - very impressed with this and would recommend it if you like a firmer massage. The heat option is also very good and relaxing. Only had a few weeks but my partner and myself both love it and fight over who's turn it is to sit in heaven for 15 mins at a time, certainly worth the price after all the money I've wasted on rubbish in the past.
